Class ReservationManager

java.lang.Object
ReservationManager
public class ReservationManager extends Object
Represents a Reservation Manager in the restaurant. A Reservation Manager can create, check and cancel reservations.
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
11
Author:
Tan Zheng Kai

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationManager

      public ReservationManager()
      Create ReservationManager with a Reservation ArrayList

  • Method Details

    • printInterface

      public void printInterface()
      Prints a selection of choices for user to pick. User can either create a reservation, check their reservation status or cancel their current reservation. Reservation manager can also remove expired reservations present in the list.

    • createReservation

      public void createReservation()
      Creating a Reservation with a customer's contact number, date of reservation to be made, expected time of arrival and number of pax. Checks for available table with right number of seats to be reserved. Reservation will fail if a table cannot be found.

    • checkReservation

      public void checkReservation()
      Checking reservation using contact number of person who booked it.

    • checkExist

      public Reservation checkExist​(int contactNumber)
      Checking if reservation exists.
      Parameters:
      contactNumber - Contact number to be checked with reservationList.
      Returns:
      The Reservation that is being searched for.

    • removeReservation

      public void removeReservation()
      Removing a reservation from reservationList with an input contactNumber.

    • checkAndRemoveExpired

      public void checkAndRemoveExpired()
      Checks and remove expired Reservations.

    • getReservation

      public Reservation getReservation​(int contact)
      Getting Reservation object.
      Parameters:
      contact - The reservation made by this contact number.
      Returns:
      Reservation object.

    • printReservationList

      public void printReservationList()
      Prints the reservationList.
